definition: v. 放弃，抛弃；n. 放纵，狂热
mnemonic_content: a（一个）+ band（乐队）+ on（在...上）→ 一个乐队在台上演出时突然放弃了，抛弃了观众。记住：放弃、抛弃。
example_sentence: He had to abandon his car in the snow and walk home.

mnemonic_content: able（能够的）+ ity（名词后缀）→ 能够做某事的状态 → 能力。词根记忆：able表示能够，加上名词后缀ity。
example_sentence: She has the ability to solve complex problems quickly.

mnemonic_content: 谐音：爱不走吧 → 海绵爱不走吧，因为它要吸收水分。记住：吸收。
example_sentence: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil through their roots.

definition: adj. 学术的，学院的；n. 学者
mnemonic_content: academ（学院）+ ic（形容词后缀）→ 学院的 → 学术的。来源于古希腊哲学家柏拉图创办的学院Academy。
example_sentence: His academic performance has improved significantly this semester.

mnemonic_content: ac（向，朝）+ cept（拿，取）→ 向着拿过来 → 接受。词根cept表示拿、取，如concept（概念）。
example_sentence: I accept your apology and hope we can move forward.
